description: Toyota has delivered quality for years and this car is no exception. This Toyota Allion 240 A15 2002 G grade has travelled a total of 183500km and features a Automatic transmission system as well as other great features. Priced at Rs.3290000, this car is fantastic value for money. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Toyota Allion G Grade 2002
